name: Something Wicked This Way Comes
description:
Something Wicked This Way Comes is an educational game, based on Macbeth, that aims to demystify Shakespeare's language for players and show how enjoyable his plays can be. Taking on the role of one of the three witches – central characters in ‘The Scottish Play’ – the player must navigate a series of language-based puzzles, before finally facing Macbeth in turn-based combat. 

"Do you have what it takes, sister?"
